actions.text: Referred to Joint Committee on Atomic Energy.

official_title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1964 to require that all proposed agreements between the United States and any foreign power for cooperation on atomic energy development be subject to a congressional power to disapprove.

summary.text: Requires, under the Atomic Energy Act of 1954, that all proposed agreements between the United States and any foreign power for cooperation on atomic energy development be subject to a congressional power to disapprove. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 2153)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1964 to require that all proposed agreements between the United States and any foreign power for cooperation on atomic energy development be subject to a congressional power to disapprove.
